idiom.meaning: Honor one's teachers or humble origins
idiom.example: Despite his formal training, he respected the folk traditions of his hometown artisans

shortDescription: The Warring States period text 'Lü's Spring and Autumn Annals' introduces this image of loving fur (爱毛) so much that one turns a fur coat inside out (反裘) to examine its foundation.
